/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from "react"; const statuses = { Paid: "text-green-700 bg-green-50 ring-green-600/20", Withdraw: "text-gray-600 bg-gray-50 ring-gray-500/10", Overdue: "text-red-700 bg-red-50 ring-red-600/10", }; const transaction = [ { name: "F45", purpose: "Booked", date: "02/02/2024", time: "11:20:10 PM", amount: " - $10.00 ", status: "Completed", }, // More people... ]; const TransactionCard = ({ selectedOption, onSelectChange }) => (

Transactions

{transaction.map((transactions) => ( ))}
Customer Name Purpose Date Time Amount Status
{transactions.name} {transactions.purpose} {transactions.date} {transactions.time} {transactions.amount} {transactions.status}
); export default TransactionCard;
